refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Scilab functions are variable, funcprot allows the user to specify what scilab do when such variables are redefined.

listitem.para: If prot==0 nothing special is done
If prot==1 scilab issues a warning message when a function is redefined (default mode)
If prot==2 scilab issues an error when a function is redefined

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: funcprot(1) deff('[x]=foo(a)','x=a') deff('[x]=foo(a)','x=a+1') foo=33 funcprot(0) deff('[x]=foo(a)','x=a') deff('[x]=foo(a)','x=a+1') foo=33
